title: Birthday Candle - 144 Count Mix Color Birthday Candles for Cake, Cake Candle for Birthday, Party Small Candles…
features: Diverse Palette of Colors: Offering birthday candles in red, blue, white, pink, and yellow to brighten any celebration with a burst of color.
Elegance in Design: Each candle is thin and 6 cm tall, designed to provide a touch of sophistication to cake decorations.
Bulk Availability: Sold in packs of 144, ensuring a plentiful supply for multiple events and reducing the frequency of purchases.
Quality Material: Made from paraffin wax, ensuring a longer burn time and a steady flame.
Versatile Celebratory Use: Perfect for not only birthday parties but also for anniversaries, graduations, and any milestone celebrations.
Decorative and Functional: These candles are not just for illumination but also serve as a beautiful enhancement to the party decor.
Romance-Inspired Choices: The red birthday candle is particularly suited for occasions that call for a touch of love and romance like Valentine's Day.
Memorable Celebrations: Aimed at creating unforgettable moments, candles from by Tugba Aydan Home Design are more than just cake toppers – they're an integral part of the celebratory experience.
description: Product Description Enhance Your Celebrations with By Tugba Aydan Home Design Birthday Candles Introduction to the Ultimate Party Accessory In the world of celebration, the smallest details can transform a simple gathering into an unforgettable event. By Tugba Aydan Home Design is proud to introduce a line of birthday candles that promise to bring a splash of color, elegance, and joy to your festivities. These aren't just any candles; they are a testament to the beauty and vibrancy of life's special moments. Unveiling the Magic: Where to Use Our Candles Birthday Bashes: The quintessential accessory for any birthday cake, our candles will make your wish-making moment truly magical. Anniversary Celebrations: Add a touch of romance and nostalgia by adorning your anniversary cake with our elegant candles. Special Occasions: Whether it's a graduation, a job promotion, or a retirement party, our candles serve as the perfect emblem of celebration. Our Birthday Candles in Your Best Moments Elegantly Slim and Perfectly Sized Crafted with attention to detail, our candles stand at an ideal height of 6 cm. Their slim profile exudes elegance, adding a sophisticated touch to your cake without overwhelming its design. A Symphony of Colors Our candles come in an array of captivating colors: pink, blue, red, white, and yellow. These shades are carefully selected to complement any cake design and party theme, making your celebration a visually stunning event. Generous Quantity for Endless Joy Each pack contains 72-144 or 288 candles, ensuring you have a plentiful supply to adorn cakes for all occasions, from intimate gatherings to grand parties. This generous quantity means you’ll always be prepared to light up your celebrations. Light Up the Celebration: Long-Lasting Burn of Our Candles Our birthday candles are stunning, easy to use, and burn beautifully, providing a warm and vibrant flame for 4-6 minutes. There's no need to be concerned that the candles may burn out before the birthday person makes a wish. You can be confident that the magic of the occasion will remain just long enough for the birthday person to wish and the candles to be blown out in a blaze of glory thanks to our candles' prolonged burn times. Every occasion, including weddings, outdoor dinner parties, and baby showers, uses our birthday candles. Use them to adorn cakes or cupcakes and add a distinctive touch to any occasion. Our candles are safe to use for cakes and other baked goods because they are made of non-toxic wax. Cake dripping can easily be cleaned off and is still completely edible. Bring the fun and magic to any celebration with our versatile and colorful birthday candles - the perfect addition to any party! More Than Just Cake: Celebrate Any Occasion Each occasion can benefit from our candles' charm and joy, whether a special supper, a picnic, or a camping trip. Hence, whether you're blowing out candles on a cake, having a romantic meal with your significant other, or hanging out with friends by a campfire, our candles will brighten the occasion and help you make lifelong memories. With our entertaining and simple-to-light birthday candles, you can make your loved one's birthday celebration unique. It produces priceless memories that will endure forever. Our candles are available in four diverse hues: blue, pink, yellow, and white. For more imaginative and colorful arrangements, mix & combine. You get a lot of candles for your money because each pack contains 72-144 or 288 candles. Those many candles are more than enough for all the celebrations in a year!
